title: Anyone up for a chess match?
content: Is anyone up for a chess match? Please mind that you will be up against a rookie.

comments.body: Why not how do we play lol

Sorry, I don't play online as I'm new. Why not play it in real. It'll be more fun as we'd get to meet each other

I'll teach you. Even I am not a master at it
